body_html: @ramonh can you add method proxies for it? It's stored on the user (as are several other of the application-specific fields). The draft has a reference to the users (students) so the validations should just make sure the users have their corresponding attributes set.
body_text: @ramonh can you add method proxies for it? It's stored on the user (as are several other of the application-specific fields). The draft has a reference to the users (students) so the validations should just make sure the users have their corresponding attributes set.
body: @ramonh can you add method proxies for it? It's stored on the user (as are several other of the application-specific fields). The draft has a reference to the users (`students`) so the validations should just make sure the users have their corresponding attributes set.
